title: She Demoted Her Maid Of Honor Because She Refused To Do This
description:
Her cousin was failing as her maid of honor, so she demoted her to being a bridesmaid, and she still couldn't handle those responsibilities. Now she's questioning if she should even invite her to the wedding. What should she do?
